home.title: Leverage the full potential of your data
home.subtitle: Don't become a hostage to the format

automaticMigration.title: Automatic migration
automaticMigration.content: With just the access credentials, Data2Graph migrates data from various sources to Neo4j.

streaming.title: Streaming
streaming.content: Data2Graph performs data processing in real time and you can control its execution.

metricsVisualization.title: Metrics visualization
metricsVisualization.content: Track the migration performance through dashboards.

scale.title: Scale as needed
scale.content: Data2Graph is scalable and can be used in different migration scenarios, both using resources from your local machine and in a cluster.

automaticMigration.title: Completely automatic migration
automaticMigration.content: Use JSON data with any level of complexity and the migration will occur automatically.

jsonToGraph.title: From JSON objects to graphs
jsonToGraph.content: Objects are transformed into vertices and edges, maintaining the structure and relationships between them.

aggregatedMetrics.title: With aggregated metrics
aggregatedMetrics.content: Visualize aggregated performance metrics of the migration and track progress.

realTimeMetrics.title: And real-time metrics
realTimeMetrics.content: Track the migration progress in real time and make data-driven decisions.

streamingTurboC2.title: With streaming from Turbo C2
streamingTurboC2.content: Visualize and manage your migration using Turbo C2 and keep your data up to date.

databaseConnection.title: Requiring only the database connection
databaseConnection.content: Connect to the database of your choice and migrate data simply.
